name: NSColor.SystemEffect
desc: Constants for user interactions that change the appearance of a view or control.

items.name: case pressed
items.desc: The color that indicates the item was pressed.

items.name: case deepPressed
items.desc: The color that indicates the item received a deep press.

items.name: case disabled
items.desc: The color that indicates the item is disabled.

items.name: case rollover
items.desc: The color that indicates the mouse rolled over the item.
